attributes.action: Make Compulsory the collection of houshold waste during OFF PEAK times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many A roads up & down the U.K are clogged up on a daily basis because of the times that Refuse Collection Lorries start their collections of houshold waste.This causes immense inconvenience to the motorist in general and urgently needs to be reviwed by ALL Local councils up & down the country.It is so obvious that if they were to start their collection @0930hr and stop @ 1500hr - re-start @ 1830hr & finish @ 2100hr then all of the congestion that they cause would cease immediateley..
